For those that spoke about the original voicework versus the dub, I prefer the original cause thats what I first heard it in with english subs.  The one eglish dub I've seen this in was on cartoon network and it was heavily edited removing all nominally mature material.  So when possible I would like the original over a dub, just in case.  Thanks for the great upload either way, great show.
